data.title: Passions Casting News
data.meta_description: See which actors are coming, going and staying on the popular daytime soap opera Passions. -  Passions Casting News - Daytime TV at BellaOnline
data.text:
Comings

2007

chris Maleki (Spike Lester) reprises his role on November 14th.

Larry Blum, John Ames and Mark John Packer (Demons) all appear in a demonic form beginning September 6th.

John Reilly (Alistair Crane) will return from the depths of his fiery grave on August 20th.

Hannia Guillen (Paloma #2) will debut as Paloma when Passions moves to DirecTV in September.

Amy Castle (Viki) will make her appearance as Esme's niece on August 20th.

Adrian Wilson (Chris Boothe) returns to Harmony on August 13th.

Melissa Sward (Pretty) arrives in Harmony July 30th.

Danny Woodburn (Demon Elf) will be comically disturbing Harmony in June.

Kim Huber (Young Tabitha) appears in flashback musical numbers.

Melissa Fahn (Young Esmerelda) appears in flashback musical numbers.

Georgia Engel (Esmerelda) heads up the Good Witch School beginning June 28th.

Vern Urich (ex-Warlock) returns as the Zoo Keeper on May 16th.

Elizabeth Storm (Sister Alice) is cast as nun at the prison. Look for her to air on May 21st.

Lucy Lee Flippen (Mrs. Lucy) will play the role of Endora’s teacher.

Liza Huber (Gwen Winthrop) returns on May 10th!

Erin Cardillo (Esme) returns to Passions, according to her official website, for 4 episodes: April 27th, May 3rd, 7th and 9th.

Daphnee Duplaix Samuel (Valerie) will reprise her role on April 16th.

Roscoe Born will play the role of a prison warden.

Tonya Walker-Davidson reprises her role as attorney, Grace Nancier.

Liza Huber (Gwen Winthrop) is set to return to work after her maternity leave is up.

Bill Bookston (Apartment Manager) will begin work on March 29th.

Bruce Gray (Judge Reilly) returns March 8th.

The Scissor Sisters (Jake Shears, Babydaddy, Ana Matronic, Paddy Boom and Del Marquis) will appear as themselves in February.

Siena Goines (Valerie) will temporary replace Daphnée Duplaix Samuel while she is on maternity leave. The change will take effect January 30th.

Kristina Sisco (Charity Standish) has been cast in this short-term role. While her original run was as the 'Charity look alike', she will come back as the real Charity on January 19th.

Goings

2007

Silvana Arias (Paloma) will not be moving to DirecTV. Her role has been recast.

James Stevenson (Jared Casey) will not move to DirecTV.

Dana Sparks (Grace Bennett) will leave Harmony for the time being.

Staying

2007

Andrea Evans (Rebecca) confirms that she has re-signed with PASSIONS and will continue to play Rebecca, on a recurring contract, when the show makes its jump to DirecTV in September, quashing rumors that Evans may reprise her popular role of Tina on ONE LIFE TO LIVE.

Kim Johnston Ulrich (Ivy Crane) has publicly announced she will be staying with Passions once it moves to DirecTV.

Dylan Fergus (Noah Bennett) has publicly announced she will be staying with Passions once it moves to DirecTV.

Galen Gering (Luis Lopez-Fitzgerald) has publicly announced she will be staying with Passions once it moves to DirecTV.

Emily Harper (Fancy Crane) has publicly announced she will be staying with Passions once it moves to DirecTV.

Lindsay Hartley (Theresa Casey) has publicly announced she will be staying with Passions once it moves to DirecTV.

Liza Huber (Gwen Winthrop) has publicly announced she will be staying with Passions once it moves to DirecTV.

James Hyde (Sam Bennett) has publicly announced she will be staying with Passions once it moves to DirecTV.

Juliet Mills (Tabitha Lenox) has publicly announced she will be staying with Passions once it moves to DirecTV.

Heidi Mueller (Kay Crane) has publicly announced she will be staying with Passions once it moves to DirecTV.

Tracey Ross (Eve Russell) has publicly announced she will be staying with Passions once it moves to DirecTV.

Eva Tamargo (Pilar Lopez-Fitzgerald) has publicly announced she will be staying with Passions once it moves to DirecTV.

McKenzie Westmore (Sheridan Crane) has publicly announced she will be staying with Passions once it moves to DirecTV.

Erin Cardillo (Esme)has publicly announced she will be staying with Passions once it moves to DirecTV.

Eric Martsolf (Ethan Winthrop) has confirmed that he has signed on to the show for the DirecTV.

Ben Masters (Julian Crane) has publicly announced he will be staying with Passions once it moves to DirecTV.
